page.title: 04DE LA POLE HOSPITAL
page.content: On Friday 28th June 1985 our group went to visit De La Pole hospital to see how they lived and how it looked .We arrived there and split up into two groups(boys and girls) a male nurse took us to a ward where old people go in an afternoon to make toys,puppets and clothes.They are told to do these things themselves. The nurse then took us into a woodwork room where only 4-5 people go at one time and there they make stools and chairs.The man then swapped groups and had another man to take us to a ward where people slept.There are 4 people to a room.In this ward are 4 special beds which when you put your foot on a peddle it goes up or down,these beds cost about Â£1000 each.
